Title: Identity Crisis
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Amy Berg, Greg Plageman
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Taraji P. Henson, Kevin Chapman, Michael Emerson
Plot: Finch and Mr. Reese are going after a person who seems to be leading a double life. However, they soon realize there's too persons having the same social security number; one of which is in danger and one who's an impostor.
